original_text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves, and are become judges of evil thoughts?
korean_text: 너희끼리 서로 차별하며 악한 생각으로 판단하는 자가 되는 것이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves
and are become judges of evil thoughts?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 악한 생각을 하는 판단자가 되었느냐?
